required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Platform for Multidisciplinary Medical Artificial Intelligence Development
clinical_study.official_title: A Platform for Multidisciplinary Medical Artificial Intelligence Development

brief_summary.textblock: Biomedical deep learning (DL) often relies heavily on generating reliable labels for large-scale data and highly technical requirements for model training. To efficiently develop DL models, we established an integrated platform to introduce automation to both annotation and model training-the primary process of DL model development. Based on this platform, we quantitively validated and compared the annotation strategy and AI model development with the pure manual annotation method performed on medical image datasets from multiple disciplines.

primary_outcome.description: calculate annotation accuracy for comparison between groups with using the annotation results

secondary_outcome.description: calculate AI model accuracy for comparison between groups with using the model predicted results
calculate AI model AUCs for comparison between groups with using the model predicted results
calculate annotation time cost for comparison between groups with using the time recorded during the tests

arm_group.description: healthcare professionals and machine collaboration for annotation and AI model development
healthcare professionals for pure manual annotation and AI model development

study_pop.textblock: medical imaging for multiple disciplines including ophthalmology, pathology, radiography, blood cells, and endoscopy

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- have medical imaging record (including ophthalmology, pathology, radiography, blood cells, and endoscopy)
Exclusion Criteria:
- unqualified medical imaging

overall_official.affiliation: Zhongshan Ophthalmic Center, Sun Yat-sen Univerisity

facility.name: Zhongshan Ophthalmic Center, Sun Yat-sen Univerisity
